name: SPACE RACER (Ashivo)
description:
Space Racer is a 2 player game that is inspired by the old game 'Space Race'!

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Space_Race_(video_game)

What is it about?

Each spaceship players must race to the top of the border to gain a score.

BUT becareful though, as they are rocks flying across the space to destroy your ships!

Controls:

PLAYER 1 - W, A, S, D

PLAYER 2 - UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT ARROW KEYS

MAIN MENU MUSIC:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9DGO2Vtppu4&list=PLobY7vO0pgVKn4FRDgwXk5FUSiGS8_jA8&index=24

MADE WITH LOVE BY: PAUL QUINN
